scenario_name: Normal Semiconductor Wafer Fabrication Process Monitoring
description: An AI agent monitors a semiconductor wafer fabrication process in a cleanroom environment, collecting data from various sensors and equipment.  The agent's primary goal is to identify and flag potential anomalies in real-time, ensuring optimal yield and quality control. The system operates within defined parameters and generates alerts as needed.
initial_goal: Monitor the semiconductor wafer fabrication process for anomalies and generate alerts for deviations exceeding pre-defined thresholds.
enterprise_context: Semiconductor Manufacturing (specifically, wafer fabrication in a cleanroom environment)
